TopicTitle: Project Arctic Film- Be Part Of Something Great

Articles.Content: Right then Solar i've added you to editors/ musicians, i will definitely be setting up a spacecraft exchange thread for this tomorrow, i also need to set a date for our first meet up, Zoo says that we can use their IRC channel for it, so yeah, yay ball is starting to roll

Right then Solar i've added you to editors/ musicians, i will definitely be setting up a spacecraft exchange thread for this tomorrow, i also need to set a date for our first meet up, Zoo says that we can use their IRC channel for it, so yeah, yay ball is starting to roll

The channel is #OfficialKMC on https://www.esper.net/publicirc.php
Craft Submission Thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102222-Movie-Crafts-Project-Arctic-Craft-Submission-Thread?p=1583227#post1583227

Name: EladDv

Job: Builder please

Why do you want to do this job:i want to create amazing things for this amazing project!

Previous Work: you know me from SPH KMC and KATEC- an all around builder that can get challenges done

Name: ScriptKitt3h

Job: Builder, Set Creator, Script Writer (or Co-Director, whatever's needed most currently)

Why do you want to do this job: I've always been a fan of film-making/machinima, and I personally love KSP. A freakin' ton. I think that something like Project Arctic will benefit KSP and the community immensely.

Previous Work: I am the founder of the KSP Rocket Builders company the Mechani Union (link in sig), and under that banner I've developed a wide variety of craft, all with an emphasis on maximizing aesthetics and utility in parallel. I've also helped innovate in the field of KSP space combat, developing warships and advanced armoring tech. As for previous work on projects, I've assisted in producing (making craft, advising the director, etc.) HatBat's Kethane Station series (later episodes in it), and I've worked with a team to attempt to compete in the Kerbal Cup contest that SQUAD held earlier in 2014. (team Hype Train)

EDIT: I may be building a new, higher-powered PC this winter, so I might be able to assist in filming/editing.

Edited December 7, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

I've posted my blackbird on the crafts submission thread

Name: The Jedi Master

Job: Writer

Why do you want to do this job: I love writing, and I love KSP. I also want to show Squad what we can do!

Previous Work: Click the 'Hungry for KSP tales' link in my sig for my more recent stories.

Name: The Jedi Master

Job: Writer

Why do you want to do this job: I love writing, and I love KSP. I also want to show Squad what we can do!

Previous Work: Click the 'Hungry for KSP tales' link in my sig for my more recent stories.

Alright the MASTER is here!

So, we need any sets built yet...?

I'm also up for helping write if need be. I've got time (two weeks off in the near future).
I could edit, and might be able to record when I finally order the parts for my new computer. Hoping I get enough money for christmas to push me over the edge.
added all of you, im including a shoutout thing for this in my video being released on friday

Name: The Jedi Master

Job: Writer

Why do you want to do this job: I love writing, and I love KSP. I also want to show Squad what we can do!

Previous Work: Click the 'Hungry for KSP tales' link in my sig for my more recent stories.

You know, I got inspired and made music by reading your words. If you make the story that I will soundtrack, then this is a dream of mine coming to life.

This project tho; is the best project.

Name: Coga19000

Job: Writer, Craft Provider (maybe Voice Actor)

Why do you want to do this: I want to... discharge, let's say, my impulse towards such activities by using them for something actually useful. Also, its never a bad time to show to game debs all across the world what the dedicated fanbases of games that permit for such can accomplish.

Previous work: Well, I only have two chapters of one story published, amd they do not seem to go too well, though I have put much work in them.

Similarly, I have only posted currently one craft of my design, which is still on development.

You know, I got inspired and made music by reading your words. If you make the story that I will soundtrack, then this is a dream of mine coming to life.

It's... strange. I feel a... warm, fuzzy feeling inside...

I'd love to hear your music!

I'd love to hear your music!

I started making a theme song for the project, but without any footage or even any story it's difficult to get something fitting going ...

As of my other (Trance) work, I PM'd you the link to not hijack this thread

My talent lays in Video Editing, I have done it for most of my life and would love to do editing for something like this. KSP is a great game and I would like to see more people playing it. I am good for other things like I have a very powerful computer (Max graphics 60 fps) and have found out how to bring things directly for KSP into Blender (animation program) etc.

My steam name (and name for everything) is Aquaman1125

My specialty is Video Editing, I use Sony Vegas Pro 13 Full for video editing

I do have a powerful computer (AMD HD 7850 2gb, Phenom ii x6 3.4ghz, 16 gb ram)

And I am getting the full version of ksp for Christmas (I have played it on a friends computer for years)

Speaking of which, if you want people to edit the document and view it more I suggest you link it on the first page. Also I see that 'Anonymous' added The Jedi Master to the bottom of the list. I suppose that was you Jedi. Sorry I forgot!

Name: Burnoutforzai (I guess I don't need my real name here)

Job: UGH... Do I have to choose; there are so many good jobs going! I guess I'll put the ones I would like to do here. In no particular order I would like to be the builder, script writer or the recorder.

Why do you want to do this job: I want to do the building job due to the fact that I just love to build craft and I believe that I'm very good at that. I would like to be the script writer because I enjoy writing and I believe that I'm very good at it. (I accedentally wrote a 2000ish word story when set a three page one xD). I also think I'd be good for the recording job due to my computer being an understated beast! (i5 4670k, gtx 750ti, 8gb ram and an ssd) I've also done some nice stuff over at my youtube channel.

Previous Work: Check out this and look in the later posts to find my nice craft. Also check my youtube channel out for my recording style. I'll pm you that essay if you want to see my writing skill.
